prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a slender, imposing feline deity, smooth purple skin, piercing yellow eyes, large pointed ears, wearing ornate Egyptian jewelry and robes
feature_prompt: impossibly smooth purple skin texture, subtle biological sheen, volumetric rim lighting, macro detail on skin surface, sharp focus on crystalline yellow eyes
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, drawing, plastic skin, toy, rough texture, diseased, wounded, gore, human ears, low quality
